meanings.definition: The quality or state of being swift.
meanings.sent1: Her swiftness in running impressed everyone at the race.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah's swiftness allowed it to catch its prey easily.
meanings.sent3: The snail wished it had the swiftness of the hare during the race.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by with the swiftness of a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The swiftness of the river's current was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The act or quality of moving swiftly.
meanings.sent1: The swiftness of the car surprised everyone as it zoomed past.
meanings.sent2: The swiftness of the wind made the trees sway vigorously.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's swiftness in escaping his crib was both impressive and alarming.
meanings.sent4: The swiftness of the avalanche was terrifying to witness.
meanings.sent5: The swiftness of the squirrel's movements made it hard to track with your eyes.
